snippet: At the American Economic Association’s annual meeting, what was once mainly an issue among players on the margins of the profession is taking center stage.
abstract: New research presented at annual meeting of American Economic Association offers fresh perspectives on growth of income inequality and how it is changing national and global economy; top one-quarter of 1 percent of country's employed population have had huge gains in income and wealth in recent decades.
lead_paragraph: At the American Economic Association’s annual meeting, what was once mainly an issue among players on the margins of the profession is taking center stage.

headline.main: Economists Take Aim at Wealth Inequality
